flawed_nl_solution:
Out of the 20 students, 20 x 1/4 = <<20*1/4=80/1>>80/1 students stayed in the classroom.
While 20 - 80/1 = <<20-80/1=-60>>-60 students went to the playground.
Out of these -60 students, -60 x 1/3 = <<-60*1/3=-20>>-20 are boys.
Therefore, -60 - -20 = <<-60--20=-40>>-40 girl students from this class are in the playground.
#### -40

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 80/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
